data.Sentence_cn: 当一架来自伦敦的飞机抵达悉尼机场时，
data.Sentence: When a plane from London arrived at Sydney airport,

data.Sentence_cn: 工人们开始卸下装有服装的一批木箱。
data.Sentence: workers began to unload a number of wooden boxes which contained clothing.

data.Sentence_cn: 其中有只箱子特别重，可谁也弄不清是怎么回事。
data.Sentence: No one could account for the fact that one of the boxes was extremely heavy.

data.Sentence_cn: 突然一个工人想到打开箱子看看。
data.Sentence: It suddenly occurred to one of the workers to open up the box.
He was astonished at what he found.

data.Sentence_cn: 箱内有一个人正躺在一堆毛织品之上。
data.Sentence: A man was lying in the box on top of a pile of woollen goods.

data.Sentence_cn: 他由于被人发现而感到非常吃惊，甚至都没有企图逃跑。
data.Sentence: He was so surprised at being discovered that he did not even try to run away.

data.Sentence_cn: 此人被逮捕后，承认他是在飞机离开伦敦前躲进箱里的。
data.Sentence: After he was arrested, the man admitted hiding in the box before the plane left London.

data.Sentence_cn: 他经历了一次漫长而又难受的旅程，因为他在那木箱里闷了18个多小时。
data.Sentence: He had had a long and uncomfortable trip, for he had been confined to the wooden box for over eighteen hours.

data.Sentence_cn: 此人被责令交付旅费3,500英镑，
data.Sentence: The man was ordered to pay $3,500 for the cost of the trip.
The normal price of a ticket is $2,000!
